action.msg: Will you be quiet? Just let everyone know we're here while we're at it!
Oh, oops. Guess I was getting into it.
I guess that's all we could do for now.
Oh! Sure, that was fun I guess. Just one though?...
You haven't changed much over the years, huh?
Doing another would tire me out... I'm really feeling a nap right now, honestly.
Well, I guess we should... leave? Sorry, I'm not used to this.

action.narrate: Fever walks away, stepping on Wee's tail in the process.
